title: What Do You Do When You Get The Wrong Tattoo Inked On You?!
description:
Our Intern Meredith's friend went to Israel about a month ago, and she wanted to get “The Hope” (the national anthem of Israel) tattooed on her ankle.
It’s in Hebrew, so it is read from right to left, not left to right like English. But after the tattoo was complete, they noticed it was WRONG!
She explains what happened... 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
